A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The more I think about the movie\, the more it's shifted from \"good\" to \"great\".  I don't want to spoil anything but the realization for me that the movie is about how people cope with failure and disillusionment took many scenes I initially saw as flaws and made them much more powerful (or at least understandable).  If nothing else\, it's the first SW film I've ever had to process and discuss this much post-viewing to decide how I feel about it.
